attributes.action: raise tax on petrol to disencourage driving, while reducing public transport fares.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition against road pricing has touched a national nerve. Dealing with the huge problems of climate change and congestion will cost us all money. If people are against being tracked while driving, why not go for the simpler option of raising vehicle fuel taxes, while subsiding public transport more?
